ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 254
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Do you believe every thing that Abashi Says? If So I fill sorry for you. He has Stated before that he WILL NOT say what stats do effect that we should
ygData.messageBody:
> From: jbuckingham@...
>
>
> > Does this sound like the guy is pulling my leg? Wisdom of 80 and
> > succeeding 75% versus wisdom of 153 and succeeding 60%? And not raising
> > skill on 100 attempts with INT of 200 versus raising skill 4 points with
> > INT of 156. What you think?
>
> The first is not too unbelievable, considering Abashi stated that no stats
> have any effect on your chance of a skill succeeding. The second sounds a
> little bogus though.

Do you believe every thing that Abashi Says? If So I fill sorry for you. He
has Stated before that he WILL NOT say what stats do effect that we should
figure that out ourselves so what makes you think he means what he says when
he states that stats don't effect skill Succeeding? Sorry not a Flame just
wanting you to Realize that all of what Abasi Says is not true.

Battlestaff Fuzzietoe <Wolven Reverence>, Mithaniel Marr 42nd Ranked
Druid of Karana
Master Baker, Master Brewer, Master Fletcher, Master Potter, Master
Smith
